name: startIBSSMode(withSSID:security:channel:password:)
desc: Creates a computer-to-computer (ad-hoc) network with the given network name, security type, and password on the specified channel.
declaration:
func startIBSSMode(withSSID ssidData: Data, 
          security: CWIBSSModeSecurity, 
           channel: Int, 
          password: String?) throws
